title: Policy support crucial signal of govt's commitment to 100 pc electrification: Ather Energy CEO
description: CEOs of Ather Energy and Ola Electric emphasize the importance of policy support for the electric two-wheeler industry in India. They believe in the potential of 100% electrification to reduce fossil fuel dependence and emissions. Localisation and demand incentives key to industry growth.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
